name: Idle Battle Galaxy beta (android)
description:
Live frantic battles with a friend in this survival game where both of you will fight to be the one who survives the most waves of asteroids.

Command the habitants of your planet, and let them do things for you.

Get resources by exploring and advance towards a future with better buildings and facilities for your habitants.

Don't forget to defend yourself from the endless hordes of asteroids. Your planet could end up destroyed!

It should be noted that this is a beta version, and any errors or bugs will be fixed in upcoming releases. I will be happy to read any suggestions in the comments section.
